snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan activated the National Guard, which will free up American Red Cross volunteers to join efforts to provide free supplies door to door.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder activates National Guard and asks Federal Emergency Management Agency for help in dealing with lead-tainted drinking water in city of Flint.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan activated the National Guard, which will free up American Red Cross volunteers to join efforts to provide free supplies door to door.

headline.main: National Guard to Help Flint Address Water Crisis
headline.print_headline: Troops to Help Flint Address Water Crisis
